solution_line_template: Tina ate one twice a day for 5 days so {tina_per_day}*{tina_days} = <<1*2*5={tina_ate}>>{tina_ate}
Her husband at 1 per day for 5 days so {husband_per_day}*{husband_days} = <<1*5={husband_ate}>>{husband_ate}

She made {total_brownies}, ate {tina_ate}, her husband ate {husband_ate} and the guests ate {guests_ate} so {total_brownies}-{tina_ate}-{husband_ate}-{guests_ate} = <<{total_brownies}-{tina_ate}-{husband_ate}-{guests_ate}={brownies_left}>>{brownies_left} brownies left
